newsitem.title: USA: Phar-Mor to open 2 new stores, remodel 13.
newsitem.headline: Phar-Mor to open 2 new stores, remodel 13.

text.p: Phar-Mor Inc said it plans to open two new stores and remodel 13 stores during the next year.

It said it will incorporate its "Warehouse District" format in these remodels and new stores wherever possible. The Warehouse District format expands Phar-Mor stores' existing grocery offering and adds frozen and refrigerated food.

Earlier, the company reported a fourth quarter profit, after reporting a loss for the comparable quarter a year ago. However, Phar-Mor reported a loss for its fiscal 1997 year, due to expenses associated with its proposed business combination with ShopKo Stores.
The company said it opened its 104th store in Moorestown, N.J. in July.
